sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const chartMap = { "Aleutian Islands": "aleutian_islands", "Andaman Islands": "andaman", "Antarctica Peninsula": "antarctic", "Azores Islands": "azores", "Banda Sea": "banda", "Bismarck Sea": "bismarck", "Central Alaska": "central_alaska", "Central California": "central_california", "Central Chile": "central_chile", "Central Turkey": "central_turkey", "Easter Island Region": "easter", "Eastern Honshu": "eastern_honshu", "Eastern Turkey": "eastern_turkey", "Gulf of California": "gulf_california", "Hindukush Region": "hindukush", "Iran-Iraq Border Region": "iran_iraq", "Italy Region": "italy", "Japan Region": "japan", "Kamchatka Peninsula": "kamchatka", "Kuril Islands": "kuril", "Mid-Atlantic Ridge": "mid_atlantic", "New Zealand": "new_zealand", "Northern California": "northern_california", "Northern Chile": "northern_chile", "Near East Coast Mexico": "mexico", "Near Coast Ecuador": "ecuador", "Near Coast Peru": "peru", "Philippine Sea": "philippine", "Puerto Rico": "puerto_rico", "Solomon Islands": "solomon", "Southern Alaska": "southern_alaska", "South Sandwich Islands": "south_sandwich", "Taiwan Region": "taiwan", "Tonga Region": "tonga", "Vanuatu Islands": "vanuatu", "Western Iran": "western_iran", "Western Turkey": "western_turkey" }; const chartList = Object.keys(chartMap); export default function ChartSection() { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(chartList[0]); return (

Earthquake Chart Viewer

Displaying chart for {selected}
{ e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src = "/charts/placeholder.png"; }} />
); }
